name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-requirement-targeting-oneway-dependency-nodejs
title: Specify relationships between app capabilities
shortDescription: This sample app illustrates how to specify one-way dependency relationships between app capabilities in Microsoft Teams using the 'elementRelationshipSet' property and functionality requirements with 'hostMustSupportFunctionalities'.
longDescription: This sample app illustrates how to define one-way dependencies between various app capabilities in Microsoft Teams, including bots and tabs, using 'elementRelationshipSet' and 'hostMustSupportFunctionalities'. It allows developers to ensure that certain app features depend on the presence of specific capabilities for seamless functionality.
